1 Gil:
With this difficulty mod, you cannot earn any money regardless of the method; you will always have 1 Gil on you.
In order to complete the game:
• You start the game with the 3 batteries necessary to access the Shinra building.
• At the entrance of the Gold Saucer, you will always have 30,000 Gil, which will allow you to buy the access ticket.
• In the lower city of Junon, you will always have 10 Gil to buy the elevator guard.
